test.instr: (:ins (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y chair))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y closet))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X microwave)))) )
test.nl: Open the cupboard. Take out the white can from the washmachine. Put a book on the chair. Put a bool which is blue in the closet. Put the black remotecontrol in the closet. Go to the table. Pick up a bottle. Do not go the microwave.
